text: good morning! I hope you had a nice weekend.
Good morning, mine was pretty great, how was yours?
mine was hot! i am in florida.
Lucky, mine was stormy! Do you know what exactly we are supposed to be discussing in this chat? I'm a little lost.
yes i do! have you ever heard about save the children charity?
No I have not, but I'm very interested, tell me more plase!
it is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries
Ah alright, so in countries where it isn't as safe for children, this charity helps to defend and support them? What do they do to help?
They are essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc. They are a great organization. would you considering donating to them?
Yes I would. I'm a mother myself, so children all over the world are very important to me. I'd like to donate my whole earnings from this HIT, which I suppose is $2 if I'm reading this correctly.
so very generous of you! I will do the same. How old are your kids?

I have a 6 year old daughter and a 2 year old daughter. My 6 year old just started 1st grade and she absolutely loves school... so being reminded that there's kids out there less fortunate just strikes my heart. I sure hope someday we can accomplish a safe well-being for all the children and innocent people in this world.
i agree. That's nice to have daughters. hopefully they get along and look out for each other.
Oh they do! I'm so lucky to have 2 of them lol, because they are best friends now. Do you have kids?
i have two kids. 6 year old girl and 9 year old boy. they fight now but i hope one day they resolve that get along!
Haha cute. I think that's just how it is with brothers and sisters. I think your daughter will be lucky one day though, having an older brother to protect her.
that's what i am thinking. we might have another. it makes me sad that there isn't a little one anymore.

I definitely know the feeling. I mean, my 2 year old is currently in that "I\'m independent and not a baby anymore" stage lol when I swear just a week ago she was a snuggly baby. It break my heart when they grow up.
i hear you. enjoy them while they are little!
I will (: and good luck if you do end up having another! Family is beautiful.
